org.decomposer.nlp.extraction
Class FeatureDictionary

java.lang.Object
  org.decomposer.nlp.extraction.FeatureDictionary
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
BoundedFeatureDictionary
public class FeatureDictionary
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Dead simple bi-directional map (String to Integer) for translating tokens in text into columns ids in a term-document matrix. Also accessible, along with the id of a token, is the count of the number of rows with a nonzero value on this column.

See Also:
FeatureExtractor, Serialized Form
